SELECT /*selectErrorLogButtonShowHideOne*/ REQUST_ID , REQUST_INSTT_ID , RASMBLY_NM , TAR_LOG.SERVER_IP , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* 요청코드 */ , REQUST_RECPTN_TM /* 요청일자 */ , RESULT_CODE /* 결과코드*/ , CODE_NM /* 결과코드명 */ , RESULT_MSSAGE /* 결과메세지 */ FROM TAR_LOG, COLGOVER, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE WHERE TAR_LOG.REQUST_INSTT_ID = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND REQUST_INSTT_ID = #{requstInsttId} /* 지방의회 아이디 */ AND RESULT_CODE = CODE AND CODE_ID = 'RIS007' AND RESULT_CODE != '000' AND RESULT_CODE != '104' AND OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND CNTC_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /*selectErrorLogInfoList*/ REQUST_ID , REQUST_INSTT_ID , RASMBLY_NM , TAR_LOG.SERVER_IP , PROVD_INSTT_ID /* 요청코드 */ , REQUST_RECPTN_TM /* 요청일자 */ , RESULT_CODE /* 결과코드*/ , CODE_NM /* 결과코드명 */ , RESULT_MSSAGE /* 결과메세지 */ FROM TAR_LOG, COLGOVER, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE WHERE TAR_LOG.REQUST_INSTT_ID = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND RESULT_CODE = CODE AND CODE_ID = 'RIS007' AND RESULT_CODE != '000' AND RESULT_CODE != '104' AND OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND CNTC_ID IS NOT NULL
